channel.title: PI drops
channel.description:
These are my drops for Corporeal Beast [code]#corp beast NPC ID>>>>3104:30<<<<Drop rarity 4113:1 4111:1 452:20 2362:351 995:500000 384:70 1754:100 1514:75 890:750 9144:250 1381:1 175:1 1149:1 391:10 13736:1 13734:1 15001:1 2366:1 1249:1 15994:1 15997:1 11335:1 15996:1 4087:1 11732:1[/code]
Would I increase or decrease drop rarity for it to drop more often? And how much would I have to increase it for it to improve the drop rate by alot.

item.title: PI drops
item.dc:creator: @jake.bellotti jake.bellotti
item.description:
@jake.bellotti wrote:

Increasing the drop rarity will make it easier to get dropped.

item.title: PI drops
item.dc:creator: @classy_zezima classy zezima
item.description:
@classy_zezima wrote:

#corp beast 3104:30 4113:1 4111:1 452:20 2362:351 995:500000 384:70 1754:100 1514:75 890:750 9144:250 1381:1 175:1 1149:1 391:10 13736:1 13734:1 15001:1 2366:1 1249:1 15994:1 15997:1 11335:1 15996:1 4087:1 11732:1

see where it says 995:500000?

The gold is being dropped constantly it looks like, So the second number after the : should be the rarity.
